name: Arkanum
author: OCram85
description: An opinionated VS Code distribution. Start coding remotely with a containerized editor.

form_fields.label: Password
form_fields.hint: Optional web gui password, if Password or Hashed Password is not provided, there will be no auth.

form_fields.label: Hashed Password
form_fields.hint: Optional web gui password, overrides Password, instructions on how to create in the App description.

form_fields.label: Sudo Password
form_fields.hint: If this optional variable is set, user will have sudo access in the Arkanum terminal with the specified password.

form_fields.label: Sudo Password Hash
form_fields.hint: Optionally set sudo password via hash (takes priority over SUDO_PASSWORD var). Format is $type$salt$hashed.

form_fields.label: Default Workspace
form_fields.hint: If this optional variable is set, code-server will open this directory by default (defaults to: /config/workspace)
